pages.title: Basin Fermenting
pages.text: Simple way to turn some organic materials into useful derivatives, such as fuels, ink, and of course, alcohol.$(br2)Fermenting Basins display their progress with a pressure gauge.$(br2)They can be manually opened and closed.
To start fermenting, craft a Basin Lid, and place it on top of a Basin.$(br2)The main resource spent in fermenting is time itself.
